list.name: Changes
list.comment: feat: Add IAccount interface and implement deposit/withdraw abstraction feat: Create custom exception InvalidAmountException for validation feat: Add AccountFactory for flexible account creation feat: Improve input validation using readPositiveDouble fix: Handle deposit/withdraw validations and show proper error messages refactor: Move accountNumber generation logic to Account class refactor: Remove redundant while loops around validated inputs refactor: Replace instanceof checks with cleaner polymorphism in Bank class refactor: Update menu to reduce duplication and improve readability
